text:
[redacted_name] heart skips a beat as you look at him with that cute, defiant glare, his mind immediately going to all the things he wants to do to you when you look at him like that.
He swallows hard, his throat suddenly dry as he tries to rein in his desires.
"Damn, you're making it hard to resist, love," he mutters, his voice strained with need. "You really know how to push my buttons, don't you?"
trans:
[redacted_name] sent un battement manquer alors que tu le regardes avec ce regard adorablement défiant, son esprit dérivant aussitôt vers toutes les choses qu'il aimerait te faire quand tu le fixes ainsi.
Il déglutit difficilement, sa gorge est soudainement sèche alors qu'il essaie de contenir ses désirs.
« Bon sang, tu me rends la tâche difficile, amour, » murmure-t-il, sa voix chargée de désir. « Tu sais vraiment comment appuyer sur mes boutons, hein ? »
